PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: When filling in the Jar path information below, make sure that the JAR files are available on the execution server.

IMPORT.NAME: hbase-0.90.1-cdh3u0.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_2' OR HBASE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') AND STORE=='HBASESTORAGE') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: hive-serde-0.7.1.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_2' OR HBASE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (STORE=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: hive-common-0.7.1.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HBASE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_2' OR HBASE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (STORE=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: piggybank.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((STORE=='AVROSTORAGE') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='MAPR401') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='HDP_2_0') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='HDP_2_1') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='HDP_2_2')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: commons-io
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((STORE=='AVROSTORAGE') AND (HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HBASE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HBASE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HBASE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: avro-1.5.4.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (STORE=='AVROSTORAGE') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='HDP_2_2') AND (HBASE_VERSION!='MAPR401') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'
